languages.text: "Я..." {n}Хормейстер сжимается, будто его загнали в угол.{/n} "Нашел. Но цена... Цена! Да, Леди Теодора получила свои имена, но стоило ли оно того! Трагедия лишь чудом осталась секретом капеллы, а не эпитафией на корабельных останках".

traits.locale_text: "Я..." {n}Хормейстер переминается с ноги, будто его загнали в угол.{/n} "Завершил. Но для этого пришлось пойти на крайние меры, совершать такие вещи... Леди Теодора проявила опрометчивость, придя ко мне с подобным приказом. Трагедия лишь чудом осталась секретом капеллы, а не эпитафией на корабельных останках".

languages.text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Хормейстер сжимается, будто его загнали в угол.{/n} "Нашел. Но цена... Цена! Да, Леди Теодора получила свои имена, но стоило ли оно того! Трагедия лишь чудом осталась секретом капеллы, а не эпитафией на корабельных останках".

The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}El maestro del Coro .{/n} «Lo encontré. Pero a qué precio... ¡A qué precio! Sí, lady Theodora obtuvo los nombres que buscaba, pero ¿mereció la pena? La tragedia se ha mantenido en secreto en la capilla... mas cerca estuvo de ser un epitafio inscrito en los restos de la nave».
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}El maestro del Coro .{/n} «Lo encontré. Pero a qué precio... ¡A qué precio! Sí, lady Theodora obtuvo los nombres que buscaba, pero ¿mereció la pena? La tragedia se ha mantenido en secreto en la capilla... mas cerca estuvo de ser un epitafio inscrito en los restos de la nave».

languages.text: 「私は…」{n}クワイアーマスターは、追い詰められたように小さくなる。{/n}「見つけたさ。でも値段が…あの値段だよ！あぁ、確かにシオドーラ様は求めていた名前を手に入れたが、その価値はあったのか？悲劇は礼拝堂の中に隠された秘密のまま…しかしあと一歩のところで、船の残骸に刻まれた墓碑銘になるところだった」
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…」{n}クワイアーマスターは、追い詰められたように小さくなる。{/n}「見つけたさ。でも値段が…あの値段だよ！あぁ、確かにシオドーラ様は求めていた名前を手に入れたが、その価値はあったのか？悲劇は礼拝堂の中に隠された秘密のまま…しかしあと一歩のところで、船の残骸に刻まれた墓碑銘になるところだった」

languages.text: “我——”{n}唱诗大师畏缩着，仿佛被你逼得走投无路。{/n}“我确实找到了要找的东西，但代价……代价太可怕了！没错，西奥多拉夫人确实找到了她要找的那个名字，但这一切值得吗？这场悲剧一直回荡在这座礼拜堂里，只差一点点，船上的所有人就变成船骸里的墓志铭了。”
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

traits.locale_text: “我——”{n}唱诗大师畏缩着，仿佛被你逼得走投无路。{/n}“我确实找到了要找的东西，但代价……代价太可怕了！没错，西奥多拉夫人确实找到了她要找的那个名字，但这一切值得吗？这场悲剧一直回荡在这座礼拜堂里，只差一点点，船上的所有人就变成船骸里的墓志铭了。”

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Der Chormeister duckt sich, als wäre er in die Enge getrieben worden.{/n} "Ich habe es gefunden. Doch der Preis ... Der Preis! Ja, Lady Theodora hat die Namen bekommen, die sie wollte, doch war es das wert? Die Tragödie ist ein Geheimnis geblieben, das in der Kapelle versteckt wurde, doch um ein Haar wäre sie zu einem Epitaph auf den Überresten des Schiffs geworden."
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..."{n} Der Chormeister duckt sich, als wäre er in die Enge getrieben worden.{/n} "Ich habe es gefunden. Doch der Preis ... Der Preis! Ja, Lady Theodora hat die Namen bekommen, die sie wollte, doch war es das wert? Die Tragödie ist ein Geheimnis geblieben, das in der Kapelle versteckt wurde, doch um ein Haar wäre sie zu einem Epitaph auf den Überresten des Schiffs geworden."

languages.text: « Je... {n}Le maître de chœur esquisse un mouvement de recul, à la manière d'une bête acculée.{/n} Oui, mes recherches ont abouti. Mais si vous saviez à quel prix... Dame Théodora a bien obtenu les noms qu'elle cherchait, mais le jeu en valait-il la chandelle ? La tragédie est demeurée un secret étroitement circonscrit dans l'enceinte de cette chapelle, mais il s'en est fallu de peu qu'il devienne une épitaphe inscrite en grand sur l'épave du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."

traits.locale_text: « Je... {n}Le maître de chœur esquisse un mouvement de recul, à la manière d'une bête acculée.{/n} Oui, mes recherches ont abouti. Mais si vous saviez à quel prix... Dame Théodora a bien obtenu les noms qu'elle cherchait, mais le jeu en valait-il la chandelle ? La tragédie est demeurée un secret étroitement circonscrit dans l'enceinte de cette chapelle, mais il s'en est fallu de peu qu'il devienne une épitaphe inscrite en grand sur l'épave du vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Koro Şefi, köşeye sıkışmış gibi siniyor.{/n} "Ben buldum. Bedeliyse... O bedel! Evet, Leydi Theodora istediği isimleri aldı ama buna değer miydi? Trajedi, şapelde saklı bir sır olarak kaldı. Ancak geminin kalıntılarına işlenmiş birer sinyazıta dönüşmemize ramak kalmıştı."
languages.original_text: "I—" {n}The Choirmaster cowers, as if cornered.{/n} "I did find it. But the price... The price! Yes, Lady Theodora got the names she wanted, but was it worth it? The tragedy has remained a secret hidden within the chapel — but we were a hair's breadth away from it becoming an epitaph inscribed on the ship's remains."
